value.assetDetails: Property Title: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_propertytitle@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}, Property Type: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_propertytype@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}, Primary purpose:@{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_primarypurpose@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}, Address: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_propertyaddress']},@{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_term'], ''), ''), '', concat('Term: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_term'])))}@{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_startdate'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Start date: ', formatDateTime(convertTimeZone(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_startdate'], 'UTC', 'AUS Eastern Standard Time'), 'dd/MM/yyyy')))}  @{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_rentaltype'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Rent Type: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_rentaltype@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue'])))}  @{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccesscompanyname'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Period: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccesscompanyname'])))}@{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccesscontactperson'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Contact: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccesscontactperson'])))} @{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccessemail'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Contact: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccessemail'])))} @{if(equals(coalesce(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccessmobile'], ''), ''), '', concat(', Contact: ', string(items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_contactforaccessmobile'])))}

Motor asset type: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_motorassettype@OData.Community.Display.V1.FormattedValue']}, Registraton No: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_registrationnumber']}, Make:@{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_make']} , Model: @{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_model']}, Year:@{items('Apply_to_each_assets')?['vl_year']}

inputs.name: varAppSummaryTemplate
inputs.value:
Dear @{items('Apply_to_each_email_applicant')?['vl_fullname']},

Your application has been submitted successfully. We will get back to you shortly to confirm next steps and if any extra details are required.

Regards,
in1bank Ltd home loan application team

In1bank Ltd    Level 3, 257 Clarence Street, Sydney NSW Australia
T +1300 461 226 | E applications@in1bank.com.au
